channel.title: IDK How to make a npc drop items
channel.description: When I kill rock crabs they drop nothing at all. I want it to drop 1k , but how do I do that?

item.title: IDK How to make a npc drop items
item.dc:creator: @pfettscherscape.webs pfettscherscape.webs.com
item.description:
@pfettscherscape.webs wrote:

this is how you do it in a 317
open the npcdrops.cfg scroll down to the botom heres what mine looks like:

npcdrop = 951 0 314 100000 2139 100 2431 100

now i added that so urs wont look like that but under it type:
npcdrop = npcid 0 itemid amount

then file and save
plz rank if this is what you wanted

EDIT: PS where is the coords of the place you ganna spwan them iv benn wanting to add some crabs but i dont now were to add them

Read full topic
item.source: IDK How to make a npc drop items
